block.p: PAULL-Joseph. Died August 15, 2000 in Florida. Age 89. Beloved husband of Ann. Father of Arlyne and Mel, Martin and Sue. Adored Grandfather of Madeleine, Charlie, Caryn and Keith, Bari and Alan. Proud great Grandfather of Lizzie and Jonathan. Loved and respected brother, and uncle. Joe was a retired Vice President of the Lamport Co. In lieu of flowers the family requests contributions to the BNAI ZION Foundation, Inc. 136 E. 39 St, NYC, NY 10016. Funeral today, 11:30 am at ''Gutterman's Funeral Home'' (Riverside Bldg), 180 West 76 St. & Amsterdam Ave.

Proud great Grandfather of Lizzie and Jonathan. Loved and respected brother, and uncle. Joe was a retired Vice President of the Lamport Co.
